channel.title: Canadian University Decision - McMaster vs. Queens
channel.description:
Hi there.
From my understanding the moparisthebest community has a lot of Canadian members, so I was hoping someone could help me out.
I've been accepted to both McMaster's Computer Science program as well as Queen's Universities School of Computing, I'm kind of torn between the two and was wondering if someone (preferably with some reputable knowledge) could help advise me with my decision.
So any help is appreciated, please try to post why you think either one is better!
Thanks!
- Fear A Spoon

item.title: Canadian University Decision - McMaster vs. Queens
item.dc:creator: @Unhandled Unhandled
item.description:
@Unhandled wrote:

I don’t think there is too much of a difference in terms of academics…McMaster has the advantage of being right in Toronto, which will have a lot more opportunities for jobs etc.
